name: @abhishekguptain/mcp-search-server
description: Multi Provider Search MCP supporting Google, Tavily, DuckDuckGo, and Brave providers.

scripts.build: tsc && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' | cat - build/index.js > temp && mv temp build/index.js && node -e "require('fs').chmodSync('build/index.js', '755')"
